mapper.sql: f.TakeStock_Task_ID, f.FEntryID, f.Material_ID, f.Repertory_Count, f.IfFEntryClose, f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID
TakeStock_Task_ID, FEntryID, Material_ID, Repertory_Count, IfFEntryClose, TakeStock_Task_Material_ID
mapper.update:
update
set TakeStock_Task_ID = #{TakeStock_Task_ID}, FEntryID = #{FEntryID}, Material_ID = #{Material_ID}, Repertory_Count = #{Repertory_Count}, IfFEntryClose = #{IfFEntryClose} where TakeStock_Task_Material_ID = #{TakeStock_Task_Material_ID}
mapper.select: select f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID, f.FEntryID, --行号 a.MAT_CODE, --物料代码 a.MAT_NAME, -- 物料名称 f.Repertory_Count,--库存数量 case when f.IfFEntryClose = 1 then '未关闭' else '已关闭' end IfFEntryClose --行关闭 from MM_TakeStock_Task_Material f LEFT JOIN MBASE_MAT_BASIC a on f.Material_ID = a.MAT_BASIC_ID where f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID = #{TakeStock_Task_Material_ID}

select f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID, f.FEntryID, --行号 a.MAT_CODE, --物料代码 a.MAT_NAME, -- 物料名称 f.Repertory_Count,--库存数量 case when f.IfFEntryClose = 1 then '未关闭' else '已关闭' end IfFEntryClose --行关闭 from MM_TakeStock_Task_Material f LEFT JOIN MBASE_MAT_BASIC a on f.Material_ID = a.MAT_BASIC_ID where f.TakeStock_Task_ID = #{pd.TakeStock_Task_ID} [fhstart] ORDER BY f.FEntryID [fhend]

select f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID, f.FEntryID, --行号 a.MAT_CODE, --物料代码 a.MAT_NAME, -- 物料名称 f.Material_ID, f.Repertory_Count,--库存数量 case when f.IfFEntryClose = 1 then '未关闭' else '已关闭' end IfFEntryClose --行关闭 from MM_TakeStock_Task_Material f LEFT JOIN MBASE_MAT_BASIC a on f.Material_ID = a.MAT_BASIC_ID where f.TakeStock_Task_ID = #{TakeStock_Task_ID} ORDER BY f.FEntryID

select f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID, f.TakeStock_Task_ID, f.Material_ID,--物料ID f.FEntryID, --行号 a.MAT_CODE, --物料代码 a.MAT_NAME, -- 物料名称 a.FNAME MAT_UNIT, --物料单位 f.Repertory_Count,--库存数量 ISNULL(b.TakeStock_Count, 0) AS TakeStock_Count,--盘点数量 case when f.IfFEntryClose = 1 then '未关闭' else '已关闭' end IfFEntryClose --行关闭 from MM_TakeStock_Task_Material f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.*,t1.FNAME FROM MBASE_MAT_BASIC t LEFT JOIN MBASE_UNIT_INFO t1 ON t.MAT_MAIN_UNIT = t1.UNIT_INFO_ID ) a on f.Material_ID = a.MAT_BASIC_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID,SUM(n.TakeStock_Count)AS TakeStock_Count FROM MM_TakeStock_Task_Execute n GROUP BY n.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID ) b ON f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID=b.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID where f.TakeStock_Task_ID = #{pd.TakeStock_Task_ID}
and ( a.MAT_CODE like '%'+ #{pd.KeyWords} +'%' or a.MAT_NAME like '%'+ #{pd.KeyWords} +'%' )

select f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID, f.TakeStock_Task_ID, f.FEntryID, --行号 a.MAT_CODE, --物料代码 a.MAT_BASIC_ID,--物料ID a.MAT_NAME, -- 物料名称 a.FNAME MAT_UNIT,--物料单位 f.Repertory_Count,--库存数量 ISNULL(b.TakeStock_Count, 0) TakeStock_Count,--盘点数量 c.TaskMaterialNum,--待执行条数 case when f.IfFEntryClose = 1 then '未关闭' else '已关闭' end IfFEntryClose --行关闭 from MM_TakeStock_Task_Material f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.*,t1.FNAME FROM MBASE_MAT_BASIC t LEFT JOIN MBASE_UNIT_INFO t1 ON t.MAT_MAIN_UNIT = t1.UNIT_INFO_ID ) a on f.Material_ID = a.MAT_BASIC_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID,SUM(n.TakeStock_Count)AS TakeStock_Count FROM MM_TakeStock_Task_Execute n GROUP BY n.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID ) b ON f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID=b.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.TakeStock_Task_ID,COUNT(*) TaskMaterialNum FROM MM_TakeStock_Task_Material f WHERE f.IfFEntryClose=1 GROUP BY f.TakeStock_Task_ID ) c ON f.TakeStock_Task_ID = c.TakeStock_Task_ID where f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID = #{TakeStock_Task_Material_ID}

select f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID, f.TakeStock_Task_ID, f.Material_ID,--物料ID f.FEntryID, --行号 a.MAT_CODE, --物料代码 a.MAT_NAME, -- 物料名称 a.FNAME MAT_UNIT,--物料单位 f.Repertory_Count,--库存数量 ISNULL(b.TakeStock_Count, 0) TakeStock_Count,--盘点数量 c.TaskMaterialNum,--待执行条数 case when f.IfFEntryClose = 1 then '未关闭' else '已关闭' end IfFEntryClose --行关闭 from MM_TakeStock_Task_Material f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.*,t1.FNAME FROM MBASE_MAT_BASIC t LEFT JOIN MBASE_UNIT_INFO t1 ON t.MAT_MAIN_UNIT = t1.UNIT_INFO_ID ) a on f.Material_ID = a.MAT_BASIC_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT n.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID,SUM(n.TakeStock_Count)AS TakeStock_Count FROM MM_TakeStock_Task_Execute n GROUP BY n.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID ) b ON f.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID=b.TakeStock_Task_Material_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.TakeStock_Task_ID,COUNT(*) TaskMaterialNum FROM MM_TakeStock_Task_Material f WHERE f.IfFEntryClose=1 GROUP BY f.TakeStock_Task_ID ) c ON f.TakeStock_Task_ID = c.TakeStock_Task_ID where f.TakeStock_Task_ID = #{TakeStock_Task_ID} order by FEntryID ASC
